summary: In Porto Alegre, the unemployed Ciro has a dull life in a simple apartment with a nameless stray dog that he had found on the streets. Ciro is supported by his parents and works every now ... See full summary »
cast: Júlio Andrade|Luiz Carlos V. Coelho|Marcos Contreras|Janaína Kremer Motta|Tainá Müller|Roberto Oliveira|Sandra Possani
title: Cão Sem Dono
